statements: DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' AND quantity <= 100;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 201 OR supplier_name LIKE '%ABC%';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 202 OR address IS NULL;
